description.en: WeRead offers a vast library of authentic books, novels, comics, official accounts, and audiobooks, allowing you to read across multiple devices simultaneously. Discover more excellent books with your WeChat friends and share your thoughts anytime, making reading less lonely.
description.zh: 微信读书提供海量正版书籍、小说、漫画、公众号、听书，多设备同步实现跨屏阅读。与微信好友一起发现更多精品好书，随时交流感想，让阅读不再孤独。
